mapper.select: insert into rpd_release (releasenr, md5,system, releaseconfig,releasefilepath, releasedesc, create_time) values (#{releasenr},#{md5},#{system},#{releaseconfig},#{releasefilepath},#{releasedesc},#{create_time})
select r.releasenr, r.system, r.releaseconfig, r.releasedesc, r.create_time from rpd_release r
